attributes.action: Ensure debate about designate suicide terrorism as a crime against humanity reaches the UN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British government should ensure that the debate over designating suicide terrorism as as a crime against humanity reaches the United Nations.

The past decade has witnessed brutal acts of suicidal terrorism in the United States, the UK, Israel, India, Turkey, Spain, Bali, Egypt, Jordan and more. 

The fact that this most heinous act of modern times is not labelled as a crime against humanity in the United Nations indicates that the governments of the world are not serious enough to fight this attrocity, despite the 'war on terrorism'.

Britain should play a leading role in bringing about the designation of suicide terrorism as a crime against humanity.
